nodes.text: An intelligence officer was an individual who analyzed information for a government or organization.
During the Clone Wars, Republic Intelligence officers failed to crack a new encryption code being used by the Battle droids of the Confederacy of Independent Systems.
During the reign of the Galactic Empire, Seyn Marana served as intelligence officer.
Prior to the outbreak of the Galactic Civil War, Captain Cassian Andor of the Alliance to Restore the Republic served as an intelligence officer in Rebel Alliance Intelligence Service.
During the Galactic Civil War, Caern Adan served as an Intelligence officer in New Republic Intelligence.
The First Order had several intelligence officers in its ranks, including Tishra Kandia.
